$$ a^2 + b^2 = c^2 = \sum_{\forall i}{x_i^{2}} $$ $$ \sum_{\forall i}{x_i^{2}} $$ 
class Point {
  final double x, y;
  const Point(this.x, this.y);
  bool get isInsideUnitCircle => x * x + y * y <= 1;
}
